description:
The SERRATUS® Pace UL backpack is part of our SERRATUS® line of packs – which means it was designed in-house by MEC for the highest level of technical performance. With the comfort and convenience of a running vest and the storage and simplicity of a rolltop backpack, this ultralight pack loves to move fast along the trails. Features include abrasion resistant fabric, a comfortable harness, and an air-mesh back panel that offers maximum airflow on hot days. Dual chest pockets and the hydration system compatible design ensures water is always ready to flow. With a roomy main compartment plus load of easy access pockets, there’s plenty of room to carry all the stuff you need.

  • Nylon and Spectra® body is lightweight but durable and has a TPU coating for weather resistance
  • Air mesh shoulder straps and back panel enhances airflow
  • Lightweight shoulder harness with adjustable sternum straps
  • Large front mesh pocket for stashing items on the go
  • Side shockcord bungees secure additional items
  • Chest pockets securely hold standard sized soft flasks or other items
  • Hydration system-compatible, with hanger and hose port
  • Recco® reflector is detectable by ski patrols and search and rescue teams
name: SERRATUS Pace UL 25 Daypack - Unisex
